name: REDASTERIOD
description:
now you can colonize mars! send your rocket and start the adventure!

-build your moduls!

-achieve your achievements!

-and complete an interesting story!

remember, the game is in early access ,a lot has not been added and there are many bugs, thanks for understanding!
